title: Greg Olsen on the GOAT TE, Russell Wilson, and More. Plus, the Latest Offseason News.
description:
Kevin is joined by former NFL tight end and current Fox Sports analyst Greg Olsen to talk about Russell Wilson, almost being a Patriot, and TEU. Then he is later joined by Nora and Ben to discuss the latest offseason news, including about the Pro Bowl, the Steelers, and the 49ers-Jimmy G. saga.


Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Ben Solak
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
